message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I believe it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start the negotiation with a price of $12000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me at $9000?

I understand you're on a budget, Bob, but I'm afraid I need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I can offer it to you for $11000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $11000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $10000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at $10000?
